companions.content:
data class Dish(
    val id: Int,
    val name: String,
    val photo: String,
    val price: String,
    val comment: String
)

data class Dish(
    val id: Int,
    val name: String,
    val photo: String,
    val price: String,
    val comment: String
)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/photo"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/title"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/price"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/comment"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout>
